trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte istanze di altri tipi verso e da istanze di <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la lunghezza di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and use an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare e utilizzare un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A custom method called `ChangeLeft` is defined, which converts the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (defined in a separate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) to an instance of <xref:System.Double>, and later into a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato un metodo personalizzato `ChangeLeft` è definita, che converte il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (definito in un apposito [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) a un'istanza di <xref:System.Double>e versioni successive in un <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: This method passes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object, which converts the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> to an instance of <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo passa il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> per un <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oggetto, che converte il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> a un'istanza di <xref:System.Double>.

trans-unit.source: Notice that this value has already been converted to a <xref:System.String> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo valore è già stato convertito in un <xref:System.String> utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: This value is then passed back to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> in order to change the position of the `text1` object.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore viene quindi passato nuovamente al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> (metodo) e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> per modificare la posizione del `text1` oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni contestuali su un componente.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Identifica il tipo di dati da valutare per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible from a specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la conversione è possibile da un tipo specificato a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la lunghezza di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le conversione è possibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supporta la conversione da e verso i seguenti tipi: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni contestuali su un componente.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Identifica il tipo di dati da valutare per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible to a specified type from a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la conversione è possibile in un tipo specificato da <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la lunghezza di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion to the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la conversione in <paramref name="destinationType" /> è possibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supporta la conversione dei tipi seguenti: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni contestuali su un componente.

trans-unit.source: Represents culture-specific information that is maintained during a conversion.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta informazioni specifiche delle impostazioni cultura gestite durante una conversione.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the object that is being converted to <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Identifica l'oggetto che si sta convertendo in <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other data types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte istanze di altri tipi di dati in istanze di <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresentano la lunghezza di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che è il valore della conversione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supporta la conversione dei tipi seguenti: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato il <paramref name="source" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica se il <paramref name="source" /> non è <see langword="null" /> e non è un tipo valido per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Describes context information of a component, such as its container and <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Descrive informazioni di contesto di un componente, ad esempio il contenitore e <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies culture-specific information, including the writing system and the calendar that is used.
trans-unit.target: Identifica informazioni specifiche delle impostazioni cultura, incluso il sistema di scrittura ed il calendario utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is being converted.
trans-unit.target: Identifica <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che si sta convertendo.

trans-unit.source: The data type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di dati al quale questa istanza di <see cref="T:System.Double" /> è convertita.

trans-unit.source: Converts other types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte gli altri tipi in istanze di <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresentano la lunghezza di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che rappresenta il valore della conversione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato il <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, or the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica se il <paramref name="value" /> non è <see langword="null" /> e non è <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, o il <paramref name="destinationType" /> non è valido.
